headline: Carrier Enhances Abound Insights Assistant App to Boost Operational Insights and User Efficiency
summary: Carrier's latest enhancements to its Abound Insights Assistant app further empowers building managers and facilities teams to manage equipment operations proactively, while helping them streamline maintenance activities. Carrier Abound is part of Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid CARR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Since December 2024, Carrier Global has been in a holding pattern, posting a small return of 4% while floating around $72.46.
